entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 03:05 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
